ftbquests.chapter.092727BC36641B8A.quest: All &aSML Drill&r have a large internal inventory as a common feature.
Since it is automatically ejected from the &ctop of the controller&r, attach the &apattern provider&r directly when incorporating it into automatic crafting.
Fluid can be fed directly into the controller.
Please be careful as automation is not possible.
The same name machine is the original source.
You can create Capsule using controllers and configuration blocks as materials.
We recommend this product because manual installation is difficult.
It is better not to place it manually.
Power can be generated by feeding gas directly into the controller.
Power can be drawn from the output port.

ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description1: The following elements have been changed in the process of porting to version 1.20.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description10: An upgraded version of gas power generation has been added.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description12: The Naquadah Reactor, a higher-tier version of the Fusion Reactor, has been added.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description13: It is heavily buffed in the modpack.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description14: &e・QIO has been removed from the recipe and replaced with Super Circuit.&r
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description3: It has been replaced with Mekanism: Advanced Generators.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description5: Some of the intermediate materials used in crafting have been changed.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description7: Reason: When the Experience Obelisk was added, several additional features came bundled with it.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.description8: Some crafting recipes are now handled by this mod. For details, please refer to the quests.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest2.title: For players experienced with the 1.18 version

ftbquests.chapter.1.quest26.description1: &aExDeorum&r has been added, but all recipes except for the hammer have been removed.

ftbquests.chapter.1.quest4.description1: &aBotany Pot&r is a device used to grow crops and trees.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest4.description2: By using dirt, you can grow a tree in one minute.

ftbquests.chapter.1.quest5.description1: Sophisticated Backpacks is a backpack mod.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest5.description2: &aStack Upgrade&r is a backpack enhancement item that increases the &cstorage per slot&r when installed.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest5.subtitle: Probably the most convenient one.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest5.title: Make Backpack
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest6.description1: &aAdvanced Magnet Upgrade&r allows the backpack to function as a magnet when installed.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest6.description2: By enabling filtering, it can be set to only pick up items already stored in the backpack.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest6.description3: &aAdvanced Compacting Upgrade&r automatically compresses items using 3x3 or 2x2 recipes when installed.
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest6.subtitle: Instead Magnet Mod
ftbquests.chapter.1.quest6.title: Backpack Upgrades

ftbquests.chapter.ae2.title: AE2
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest1.descr: &aExperience Obelisk&r is a device that stores experience points.
It can store up to about &bLevel 1000&r worth of XP.
You can also input and output XP in liquid form.
&aStaff of Attunement&r is used to link the &aExperience Obelisk&r with other machines.
First, shift-right-click the &aExperience Obelisk&r, then right-click the device you want to link it to.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest1.subti: It's not just for storing XP...
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest2.descr: &aMolecular Metamorpher&r performs special processing using the XP stored in the &aExperience Obelisk&r.
It cannot be used unless linked to the &aExperience Obelisk&r.
Supports item input/output, so it can be integrated into AE auto-crafting.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest3.descr: &aPrecision Dispeller&r can remove specific enchantments from tools.
Use it linked to an &aExperience Obelisk&r.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest3.subti: If only this existed in vanilla...
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest4.descr: &aEnchanted Bookshelf&r has double the effectiveness of a vanilla bookshelf.
In other words, placing &c8&r of them allows Level 30 enchanting.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest5.descr: &aBibliophage&r is used in conjunction with various bookshelves.
Right-click a bookshelf to transform it into an &aInfected&r bookshelf.
Place an &aExperience Obelisk&r nearby to collect them.
Infected bookshelves break after a certain amount of time.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest6.descr: &aFluorescent Agar&r transforms into &aNutrient Agar&r after right-clicking it with 4 &aBibliophage&r.
&aNutrient Agar&r slowly infects adjacent bookshelves into &aInfected&r ones.
It can also convert adjacent &aFluorescent Agar&r into &aNutrient Agar&r.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest7.descr: &aInsightful Agar&r functions like &aNutrient Agar&r and also enhances adjacent &aInfected&r bookshelves.
&aInfected&r bookshelves enhanced by &aInsightful Agar&r &bproduce XP orbs more frequently&r.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.quest8.descr: &aExtravagant Agar&r functions like &aNutrient Agar&r and also enhances adjacent &aInfected&r bookshelves.
&aInfected&r bookshelves enhanced by &aExtravagant Agar&r &bincrease the amount of XP in the orbs produced&r.
ftbquests.chapter.cognition.title: Cognition
